name: Current Value
description:
'''Tim Eliot''', better known by his [[stage name]] '''Current Value''', is a German [[Drum and bass|drum & bass]] producer and DJ. Eliot began dabbling in electronic music in 1992, when he got a [[Casio]] keyboard for Christmas. Several years later he began receiving recognition on local Berlin radio stations. In 2004, after 1 year of education, he received his Diploma at the School of Audio Engineering (SAE).

In 2012, his remix of a track from [[Bj√∂rk]]'s album [[Biophilia (album)|''Biophilia'']], was included on ''Biophilia Remix Series I''.
